regular.speechText: Here is the process to enroll for a regular student. Please take your time to be guided with the steps. Good Luck

regular.steps: 1. Log in to your SIS Account.
2. Check if your grades is complete. (Grades Section.)
4. Check all the subjects and schedule to enroll.
6. Review and click Okay to confirm.

irregular.speechText: Here is the process to enroll for a irregular student. Please take your time to be guided with the steps. Good Luck

irregular.steps: 1. Log in to your SIS Account.
